item.description:
Enjoy a wonderful performance in the ballroom of the beautifully restored Taylor Bed & Breakfast.  A wonderful dessert, wine and other beverages are served after the performance. Local art is displayed on the walls.

 

Taylor House requests a $10 donation. To learn more and to make reservations go to: http://www.taylorhouse.com/index.html

 

Click on Music and Art, then click on the 'Reservation' button to save a place. You will receive an email confirming your place after you send your request for a reservation.

Let's gather outside the Taylor House at 7:15. Since doors close when the music starts, it's important to be on time.
item.name: Jazz performance (piano and cello) at Taylor Bed & Breakfast in Jamaica Plain
